title: About
paragraph1: I'm a web developer focused on the front-end. I build solutions for businesses and am passionate about open-source software. I'm firmly committed to the idea of {bitcoinCashLink}, and I design and ship projects that align with my ethics.
paragraph2: I mainly work with React and TypeScript, but I'm not tied to any specific stack: I always look for the most effective tools for each specific project. Below are some of the technologies I use regularly.
paragraph3: I'm currently developing my open-source library {bchConnectLink} as a side-project, while continuing to learn and expand my skills. Particularly, I'm learning back-end with Node.js and Express. I also work on several other side-projects (still private) whenever I can find the time.
callToAction: You can check out my {cvLink} or {contactLink}.
